text: This is a complete list of current and former Presidents of the Philippines by time in office that consists of the 16 Presidents in the history of the Philippines. The basis of the list is counted by the number of calendar days. ==Rank by time in office== Ferdinand Marcos is the longest-serving President, having been in office for 20 years, 57 days (7,362 days). Sergio Osmeña is the shortest-serving President, serving for 1 year, 300 days (665 days). Updated daily according to UTC. {| class="wikitable" |- ! OTL||# !!
